data.text: @people Aw, man. Kate Spade is David Spade’s sister and Rachel Brosnahan’s niece? Imagine the pain and grief that they’re going.

@people The sad part in all of this is that many folks don't really give the emotional hugs/support/tributes until someone dies...we need to offer more praise and encouragement while people are alive...someone knew what was going on...and did nothing...SO SAD.  #NotBlamingJustHeartbroken
